shot.primary_lens: Zeiss Supreme Prime 35mm T1.5, with a soft diffusion filter (Pro-Mist 1/4)
shot.composition: Medium close-up (MCU) on the instructor, centered, with soft background bokeh (shallow depth of field)
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Slow, smooth 4-second dolly-in movement, ending with a static locked-off shot for the remaining 4 seconds. Sequence 2 (8-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.

identity.ethnicity: Mediterranean or mixed-race (natural, glowing skin tone)

physical.posture: Perfectly straight, seated in a comfortable cross-legged meditation pose (Sukhasana)

facial_features.hair: Long, dark hair tied in a loose, elegant bun

wardrobe.top: Seamless, light grey, high-neck yoga bra
wardrobe.bottom: Matching light grey, high-waisted yoga leggings

sequences.primary_motion: The instructor remains perfectly still in meditation, with only a subtle, slow, and deep breath visible in her chest and shoulders.
Building on the initial action, the subject demonstrates additional aspects and benefits. The movement becomes more fluid and confident, showcasing expertise and comfort.
sequences.camera_follows: Wider shot revealing more context, then pushing in for detail

sequences.primary_motion: The subject concludes with a moment of satisfaction - a knowing smile, a final appreciative glance, or a confident gesture that conveys success and approval of the result.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on emotional response and final impactful moment

scene.location: Modern, minimalist yoga studio, high-end wellness center

layout.flooring: Light oak wood flooring, clean and polished
layout.walls: White or very light beige textured walls, large floor-to-ceiling windows on the right side
layout.props: A single, high-quality, light-colored yoga mat (e.g., Liforme), a small, unlit aromatherapy diffuser in the background

environment.background: Softly blurred background showing natural light streaming in and a few out-of-focus green plants (e.g., Monstera or Fiddle Leaf Fig)
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.primary_source: Large, soft natural window light (simulated by a large HMI through a 12x12 silk)
lighting.quality: Soft, diffused, and enveloping light, creating very gentle shadows
lighting.color_temperature: Daylight balanced (5600K) with a slight warmth added in post (6000K look)
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Monochromatic, soft pastels (light grey, white, light wood, subtle green)
color_grading.tone: Calm, serene, high-key, slightly desaturated for a 'zen' feel

audio.ambient: Very low-level, distant city sounds (barely audible), subtle white noise from the aromatherapy diffuser
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Extremely subtle, slow sound of deep inhalation and exhalation (ASMR quality). Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: Minimalist, ambient drone music (e.g., Brian Eno style) with a slow, evolving pad sound, very low in the mix The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles, no distracting elements
visual_rules.realism: Credible architectural environment with authentic materials. Realistic natural lighting according to time and weather. Consistent furnishing and decoration details. Correct spatial perspectives and proportions.
visual_rules.continuity: Consistency of natural light according to temporal progression. Maintenance of architectural and decorative style. Continuity of exterior views through windows. Smooth spatial flow and discovery.
